text: Shah Ahmad Shafi () (1916 â€“ 18 September 2020) was a Bangladeshi educator. He was the chief of Hefajat-e-Islam Bangladesh. He was rector of Al-Jamiatul Ahlia Darul Ulum Moinul Islam Hathazari from 1986 until his death and also the chairman of Bangladesh Qawmi Madrasah Education Board. He was born in Rangunia, Chittagong. Shafi died on 18 September 2020 from a heart attack caused by diabetes in Dhaka, aged 104. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Chittagong Division Category:Bangladeshi writers Category:Bangladeshi educators
title: Shah Ahmad Shafi
